title: Two-Bedroom Apt. w/ a W/D Set & a Walk-In Closet!
posting_body: ['A greener future is waiting in the apartment homes of Kensington Place in Sunnyvale.', 'Plan 2C  2 \xa0bed / 2 bath / 1027', 'Sq.', 'Ft / From $4,046', '* Unit 1213 - Available 08/24/22', 'Kensington Place Apartments', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '1220 Fair Oaks Avenue Sunnyvale, CA 94089', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x584', 'Property Description', 'Move into this contemporary two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment at Kensington Place!', 'The home is stylish and inviting thanks to the wood-burning fireplace and luxurious vinyl tile flooring!', 'Continue into the spacious kitchen, where you will find an efficient white appliances package, an entertainment bar, and European-style cabinetry!', 'Select kitchens also feature stainless steel appliances and granite countertops!', 'The large-capacity washer and dryer set allows you to do laundry in no time!', 'You’ll additionally find abundant storage space, including a walk-in closet in the master bedroom!', 'Within the neighborhood grounds, you can enjoy an array of activities such as swimming laps in the heated pool, breaking a sweat with the free weights in the fitness center, or socializing with neighbors in the clubhouse!', 'Commuting is a breeze thanks to the neighborhood’s convenient location between the 237 and 101 freeways.', 'Call the friendly leasing team today for more information about your next home!', 'Floor Plan/Unit Features', '* Laminate (wood-look)', '* Interior - Fireplace', 'Property Amenities', '* HighSpeed', '* ClubHouse', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* Playground', '* NightPatrol', '* ShortTermLease', '* SmokeFree', '* Laundry', '* OnsiteMaintenance', '* OnSiteManagement', '* Availability24Hours', '* PackageReceiving', '* Recycling', '* WirelessInternet', '* ConferenceRoom', '* Spa', '* Pool', '* Sundeck', '*', 'Other', '* Garage', 'Lease Terms:', 'Variable', 'Parking:', 'Type', '- Garage Lot', 'Access to underground Gated Garage and Surface Parking Available', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat, Dog s are allowed.', 'We welcome up to 3 pets per household with a $200 per pet deposit and $65 per pet monthly pet rent.', 'Cats and dogs are welcomed without weight restrictions though certain breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more details on our pet policy.', 'Building Type:', 'Garden Style', 'Year Built:', '1993', 'Remodeled:', '2014', 'Units:', '186', 'Office Hours', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 5:00pm', 'Management Company:', 'Prometheus Real Estate Group, Inc.*', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x584', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
